players.name: Alice
memory: You: "This is awful. We need to work together to find the mafia among us."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out today."
Diana: "Charlie, your claim is bold. Alice, do you have anything to say?"
Charlie: "Alice is mafia. My investigation is clear. Diana, we must vote together to win."
